/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. Buildings of different sizes and shapes flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
